unnormalised: Crop insurance, essential, no? Lost my jowar crop near Nashik last year on 23/07/2023 thanks to untimely rains. Heard Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana helps. Dad claims it’s better than nothing. Filed claim through the local SBI branch by 17:00 hrs on 30/07/2023. Still waiting for the payout, though! Anyone else from Maharashtra had similar experiences around 10/01/2024? Rs. 5000 loss at least! Bappa save us farmers! Need to check the Gram Sabha's notice board again soon.
normalised: Crop insurance, essential, no? Lost my jowar crop near Nashik last year on twenty third july two thousand and twenty three thanks to untimely rains. Heard Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana helps. Dad claims it’s better than nothing. Filed claim through the local S B I branch by five P M on thirty first july two thousand and twenty three. Still waiting for the payout, though! Anyone else from Maharashtra had similar experiences around tenth january two thousand and twenty four? Rupee five thousand loss at least! Bappa save us farmers! Need to check the Gram Sabha's notice board again soon.
